item.title: 为什么美元主导地位的终结已成为可能？
item.description:
在本期《特朗普经济学》（Trumponomics）节目中，我们将探讨唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的经济政策是否会最终击垮美元。【原文：

On this episode of Trumponomics, we look at whether Donald Trump’s economic policies will be what finally breaks the greenback’s back.

】

item.title: 高盛为凯悦出售普拉亚度假村提供 14 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团周三为凯悦酒店集团出售从 Playa Hotels & Resorts NV 收购的 15 家一价全包度假村提供了 14 亿美元的杠杆贷款。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. on Wednesday priced a $1.4 billion leveraged loan to support Hyatt Hotels Corp.’s sale of 15 all-inclusive resorts that it had acquired from Playa Hotels & Resorts NV, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 自由港停运缓解铜矿市场紧张局面
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.）在印度尼西亚拥有的一家工厂发生故障后，出人意料地出售了大量铜矿石，为面临历史性供应紧张的冶炼厂带来了短期缓解。【原文：Freeport-McMoRan Inc. is selling unexpectedly large volumes of copper ore following an outage at a plant it owns in Indonesia, bringing short-term relief to smelters who’ve faced a historic squeeze on supply.】

item.title: 思科前景黯淡，投资者渴望人工智能提振
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc.【原文：Cisco Systems Inc., the largest maker of machines that run computer networks and the internet, gave a lukewarm forecast for the current fiscal year, disappointing investors who hoped for a boost from massive AI data center projects.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 寻求私人信贷为 Olo 收购融资
item.description: 据不愿透露私人信息的知情人士透露，Thoma Bravo 已与私人信贷机构进行了谈判，以筹集 6 亿美元的债务，帮助其为收购酒店软件公司 Olo Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo has held talks with private credit lenders to raise $600 million of debt to help finance its acquisition of hospitality software company Olo Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter, who asked not to be identified discussing private information.】

item.title: 阿根廷通胀在政策失误后温和加速
item.description: 上个月，阿根廷的月度通胀势头有所回升，受管制的物价上涨与比索过剩相撞，引发了阿根廷比索自 2023 年以来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Monthly inflation in Argentina picked up some momentum last month as regulated price hikes collided with a peso overhang that sparked the currency’s worst month since 2023.】

item.title: 法官对联邦贸易委员会向媒体集团提出的广告商抵制要求感到 "不安
item.description: 联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Communication）在对一家非营利组织涉嫌抵制保守派网站广告的调查中，将其作为调查对象，遭到了法官的质疑。【原文：The Federal Trade Communication got a skeptical reception from a judge over its targeting of a nonprofit in an investigation into alleged advertising boycotts of conservative websites.】

item.title: 阿波罗正在商谈重启与汽车交易相关的 20 亿美元债务出售计划
item.description: 私募股权公司阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Private equity firm Apollo Global Management Inc. is in talks to revive a sale of more than $2 billion in debt tied to a buyout involving Canadian auto parts maker ABC Technologies Holdings Inc. that got stuck on banks’ balance sheets during April’s tariff-fueled market selloff.】

item.title: 马斯克在关闭美国国际开发署中的作用之争由法官继续审理
item.description: 马里兰州一名联邦法官裁定，指控亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克非法指挥关闭美国国际开发署的诉讼可以不顾特朗普政府的反对继续进行。【原文：A lawsuit accusing billionaire Elon Musk of unlawfully directing the closing of the US Agency for International Development can move ahead over the Trump administration’s objections, a Maryland federal judge ruled.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克表示仍预计 2025 年降息一次
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，如果劳动力市场保持稳健，他仍然认为在2025年降息一次是合适的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he continues to see one interest-rate cut as appropriate in 2025 if the labor market remains solid.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比表示即将召开的政策会议将是 "现场直播 "会议
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，央行今年秋季的会议将是 "现场直播"，因为他和他的同事们将努力解读喜忧参半的经济数据，以及如何最好地调整利率以做出回应。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said the central bank’s meetings this fall will be “live” as he and his colleagues try to interpret mixed economic data and how best to adjust interest rates in response.】

item.title: 苹果计划进军人工智能机器人、家庭安防和智能显示器领域
item.description: 苹果公司正雄心勃勃地推出一系列新设备，包括机器人、逼真版 Siri、带显示屏的智能扬声器和家庭安全摄像头，谋划人工智能卷土重来。【原文：Apple Inc. is plotting its artificial intelligence comeback with an ambitious slate of new devices, including robots, a lifelike version of Siri, a smart speaker with a display and home-security cameras.】

item.description: DARPA 的人工智能网络竞赛为修复漏洞的安全团队颁奖【原文：DARPA’s AI Cyber Contest Awards Security Teams for Fixing Flaws】

item.title: 俄罗斯暂时避开经济衰退，即使势头正在减弱
item.description: 尽管面临超高利率的压力，俄罗斯经济在上个季度还是恢复了增长，避免了衰退。【原文：Russia’s economy returned to growth last quarter, dodging a recession despite pressure from ultra-high interest rates.】

item.title: Roblox 因玩家增长首次获得 S&P 高级评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）上调了Roblox Corp.的评级，该公司为赢得新玩家所做的努力为这个流行的视频游戏平台赢得了首个投资级评级。【原文：Roblox Corp.’s efforts to win over new players has earned the popular video-game platform its first investment grade rating, after S&P Global Ratings upgraded the firm.】

item.title: 人工智能薪酬成本高昂，泰瑟枪制造商正寻求收购
item.description: 人工智能人才争夺战已变得异常残酷，就连一家在过去两年中股价上涨了两倍多的公司也难以在竞争中立于不败之地。【原文：The war for artificial intelligence talent has gotten so brutal that even a company whose stock has more than tripled over the past two years is struggling to compete.】

item.title: 加拿大央行权衡 7 月降息，选择等待更多数据
item.description: 加拿大央行在上次会议上考虑过降息，但贸易的不确定性和核心通胀率的坚挺迫使官员们维持借贷成本稳定。【原文：The Bank of Canada considered cutting interest rates at its last meeting, but trade uncertainty and sticky core inflation compelled officials to hold borrowing costs steady.】

item.title: 据说蒙特利尔银行将考虑以 10 亿美元出售交通金融部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，蒙特利尔银行正在探索出售其运输金融业务，该业务可能获得约 10 亿美元的收益。【原文：Bank of Montreal is exploring a sale of its transportation finance business, which could fetch about $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 网络漫画飙升 97%，迪士尼协议将漫威和星球大战漫画引入平台
item.description: Webtoon Entertainment Inc. 宣布与华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：Webtoon Entertainment Inc. surged more than 97%, the biggest gain since its initial public offering last year, after announcing a partnership with Walt Disney Co. that will bring iconic characters such as Marvel’s Spider-Man and Luke Skywalker of Star Wars to its platform.】

item.title: 特斯拉和英伟达新基金提供杠杆投注，不会造成巨大损失
item.description: 长期以来，杠杆 ETF 基金一直向投资者许诺能带来快速收益，但同时也有可能让亏损像滚雪球一样越滚越大。新一批与特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc）、英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Leveraged ETFs have long dangled the promise of turbocharged gains to investors along with the risk of watching losses snowball even faster. A new batch of single-stock funds tied to Tesla Inc., Nvidia Corp. and other popular names offers an escape from that trap, using options to deliver monthly leverage that matches a stock’s declines rather than magnify them.】

item.title: 前 BLS 委员称美国统计局的变革来之不易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑选的劳工统计局领导人选引起了轩然大波，因为有消息称他建议这个传统上无党派的机构暂停发布月度就业报告；而这只有总统本人才能做到。【原文：President Donald Trump’s pick to lead the Bureau of Labor Statistics caused a stir when it surfaced that he suggested the traditionally nonpartisan agency suspend the monthly jobs report — something only the president himself could do.】

item.title: 据说 BeyondTrust 的所有者正在探讨出售网络公司的事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购集团 Francisco Partners 正在探索以数十亿美元的价格出售网络安全公司 BeyondTrust Software Inc.【原文：Buyout group Francisco Partners is exploring a multibillion-dollar sale of cybersecurity firm BeyondTrust Software Inc., according to people familiar with the matter, seeking to tap in to heightened investor interest in security software offerings.】

item.title: 巴西推出一揽子纾困方案以减轻美国关税的影响
item.description: 巴西政府周三推出了一项期待已久的救济方案，其中包括 300 亿雷亚尔（约合 56 亿美元）的信贷，以支持受到唐纳德-特朗普贸易关税打击的当地企业。【原文：Brazil’s government on Wednesday rolled out a long-awaited relief package including 30 billion reais ($5.6 billion) in credit to support local companies hit by Donald Trump’s trade tariffs.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 Bullish 首次公开募股 11 亿美元，首日暴涨 143
item.description: 数字资产交易所运营商和媒体 CoinDesk 的所有者在首次公开募股中募集了 11 亿美元，之后看涨的股价比首次公开募股价格跃升了 143%。【原文：Bullish shares jumped 143% from the IPO price after the digital-asset exchange operator and owner of media outlet CoinDesk raised $1.1 billion in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 约翰霍普金斯大学因研究经费问题评级展望被降
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）以联邦研究经费的不确定性为由，将约翰霍普金斯大学的评级展望从 "积极 "下调至 "稳定"。【原文：Moody’s Ratings has lowered its outlook on Johns Hopkins University to stable from positive, citing uncertainty over federal research funding.】

item.title: 美国和加拿大为何在木材问题上针锋相对？
item.description: 美国和加拿大再次为木材问题争吵不休。【原文：The US and Canada are fighting about lumber once again.】

item.title: 美国农业部意外削减美国大豆种植面积，大豆触及五周高点
item.description: 大豆期货盘中跃升至 7 月 3 日以来的最高水平，美国农业部在上一交易日出人意料地大幅削减供应量，帮助震荡了市场。【原文：Soybean futures jumped to the highest intraday level since July 3, with the US Department of Agriculture’s surprisingly large supply cut in the previous session helping to shake up the market.】

item.title: 嘉吉公司向亿万富翁业主支付创纪录的 15 亿美元红利
item.description: 嘉吉公司（Cargill Inc. ）在最近一个财政年度的利润激增 44% 后，向控制这家全球最大农产品贸易商的亿万富豪家族支付了创纪录的股息。【原文：Cargill Inc. paid a record dividend to the billionaire families who control the world’s biggest agricultural commodities trader after profits surged 44% in its most recent financial year.】

item.title: 绩效食品委员会认为与美国食品公司合作 "毫无根据
item.description: Performance Food Group Co. 公司首席执行官称，在其竞争对手要求该公司共享潜在合并信息后，该公司董事会认为与 US Foods Holding Corp. 公司接触 "没有依据"。【原文：Performance Food Group Co.’s board determined there was “no basis” to engage with US Foods Holding Corp. after its rival requested that it share information for a potential merger, according to its chief executive officer.】
